title: Exploiting microbial genomics and synthetic biology for discovery of novel antibiotics
abstractText: Abstracts are not currently available in GtR for all funded research. This is normally because the abstract was not required at the time of proposal submission, but may be because it included sensitive information such as personal details.
impactText: We have sent the compounds we have discovered to Syngenta for biological testing Agriculture, Food and Drink
findingsText: We have discovered novel natural products from Streptomyces species The novel natural products can be screened for biological activity. This may result in the discovery of novel leads for antibiotics, anticancer agents or agrochemicals Agriculture, Food and Drink,Chemicals,Education,Manufacturing, including Industrial Biotechology,Pharmaceuticals and Medical Biotechnology
